TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed QueueTransferProtocol extends System.Enum

summary.span: Indica o protocolo a ser usado durante a transferência de mensagens entre os gerentes de fila.

span.span: Indicates the protocol to be used in transferring messages between queue managers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Especificando Srmp ou SrmpSecure quando o atributo UseActiveDirectory está definido como `true` causará uma exceção porque o enfileiramento de mensagens (MSMQ) não fornece ao usar SRMP de endereçamento do Active Directory.Specifying Srmp or SrmpSecure when the UseActiveDirectory attribute is set to `true` will cause an exception because Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not provide for Active Directory addressing when using SRMP. Propriedade UseActiveDirectory é um atributo no [ <netMsmqBinding> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/netmsmqbinding.md) e [ <msmqIntegrationBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/msmqintegrationbinding.md).UseActiveDirectory is an attribute on the [<netMsmqBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/netmsmqbinding.md) and the [<msmqIntegrationBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/msmqintegrationbinding.md). Para obter mais informações sobre filas de endereçamento, consulte [pontos de extremidade de serviço e endereçamento de fila](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md).For more information about addressing queues, see [Service Endpoints and Queue Addressing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol Native = int32(0)

summary.span: Use o protocolo nativo do MSMQ.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol Srmp = int32(1)

summary.span: Use o protocolo SRMP (Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol).

span.span: Use the Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol SrmpSecure = int32(2)

summary.span: Use o transporte SRMPS (Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol Secure).

span.span: Use the Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol Secure (SRMPS) transport.
